Definition1: You must agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before creating a new user.

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: You do not need to register when exploring our trips and prices and the possibility of booking any of the selected trips, but you need to register when you book any of the trips in order to create your own account through which you can view the record of the movements you have made through your account and it also allows us to communicate with you.
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: Do I need to register to use the Otobeas platform?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: Only the mobile number through which the booking was made and the booking employee will review your data and hand you the transportation company ticket.
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: When I go to the transportation company station, what should I tell them?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer:
• Booking via website or app
  • Booking more than one seat and the number of seats allowed to be booked at one time
  • Booking remains pending for a certain period and is automatically deleted if it is not confirmed by payment.
  • Children over 6 years old full ticket and under 6 years old with a guardian's seat

• Passenger arrival time at departure station
  • Cancellation of flight due to force majeure (weather conditions, security requirements, etc.)
  • Any change in the flight departure or arrival time is the responsibility of the transportation company.
  • Allowed Bags
  • Passenger safety is the responsibility of the transport company.
  • Public morals, compliance with transportation laws, and no smoking or electronic cigarettes are the responsibility of the passenger.
  • Commitment to rest stops during the trip. The trip may proceed without the passenger if he is late returning from the rest stop.

All we do is search for the route, for example, from Cairo to Hurghada, and specify the appropriate travel date. After that, choose the appropriate date from all land passenger transport companies. You can filter by the nearest station or a specific date. After that, choose the appropriate seat on the bus and choose the appropriate payment method, and thus you have successfully booked your ticket.
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: How do I book a ticket?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: Of course.. We search for upcoming trips in your personal account and you choose to change the date.. Select the appropriate date and pay the date change fees, of course, a full day before the flight, at least 24 hours.
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: Can I change the appointment after booking and payment?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: Of course.. five hours before the trip you can cancel the tickets and the money will be refunded to the wallet of the bus company and you can also use it to book with other companies.

No, of course not. Once the booking and payment are made, the customer’s booking is confirmed. On the day of travel, go to the station half an hour before the bus leaves to review your booking information and load your bags, if any.
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: Do I need to confirm the booking with the station after payment?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: In more than one way.. through our Facebook page "Otobeas" or through the email info@otobeas.com
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: How do I contact the Otobeas platform in case I encounter a problem with the booking?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: No, of course not. The price is the same at the station and the platform.
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: Is the ticket price different from the transportation company price?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: Of course, you can book for a friend or a family member and inform them of the booking details and phone number. The booking employee will review the data and give you the ticket immediately.
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: Can I book for someone else?

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer:
• Payment by bank cards
  • Cash payment at the nearest kiosk bearing the Obai - Fawry - Aman - Al-Ahly logo is possible.
  • Payment through electronic wallets such as Vodafone - Orange - Etisalat or bank wallet.
Sometimes the payment gateway may add its own fees ranging from 2 to 5 EGP to the booking process.

• Payment by Visa
  • Explain other payment methods and how to use them through the website or application
  • Print trip and transportation company information.
  • Print tickets or payment receipts and the passenger is responsible for keeping them and showing them when requested during the trip.
  • Confirm the booking with the transportation company by phone.

• Allowed period to modify the booking
  • Refund the ticket value in the customer's wallet on the website
UsagePolicyQuestion.Header: Modify or cancel your reservation after payment

UsagePolicyQuestion.Answer: Through our Facebook page "Otobeas" or through email info@otobeas.com
